cwe.@Name: Data Element containing Pointer Item without Proper Copy Control Element
cwe.Description: The code contains a data element with a pointer that does not have an associated copy or constructor method.

Extended_Description.xhtml:p: This issue can prevent the product from running reliably.  If the relevant code is reachable by an attacker, then this reliability problem might introduce a vulnerability.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
